original_title: Therion: Adulruna Rediviva and Beyond Budapest 2007
overview: The concert recorded in Budapest, Hungary was a concert on the “Adulruna Rediviva” 20-year Anniversary Tour in December. The idea of the tour was to play the entire "Theli" album and a set consisting of songs that the fans had voted for on the band web page.
title: Therion: Adulruna Rediviva and Beyond Budapest 2007
